/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban scene below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. In the distance, power lines crisscross against the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and street.
